cause.description:
The Cam Neely Foundation for Cancer Care is a non-profit organization who, through initiatives and programs sustained by donations, provide comfort, support and hope to cancer patients and their families.
1. Help cancer patients and their families during their treatment.
2. The Neely Cancer Fund supports treatment and research efforts.
3. The Neely House provides a convenient, comfortable place to live, relax, and talk to others.
cause.mission: To help cancer patients and their families during their treatment.
cause.name: Because Cam Neely cared
